page.title: 08Settlement
page.content: Private houses are owned by individuals.To buy the houses most people have loans from building societies or banks.These are called mortgages.Private houses are mostly in this area,detached,semi-detached or bungalows,and,in most cases,have much larger plots of land than council houses. Most people in the area we are covering think that{St.George's Hill {and Weybridge}are the most exclusive residences in this area. The price range in Weybridge and St.Georges Hill is from a small but pleasant flat for Â£30-50,000 to an enormous house with acres of land for anything over about Â£200,000.One of the least desirable places is Addlestone with many council houses and a few flats.The price range there would be for a tiny flat Â£20,000 to a
